Title: Establishes a fixed fee for the purchase of registration lists and title information
Summary: Provides that the commissioner of motor vehicles shall affix a cost for the sale of registration lists and title information or other records in bulk at the annual cost not to exceed $1,520,000; authorizes such commissioner to impose other requirements; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง202, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing a fixed fee for the purchase of registration lists and title information
